subtitle: A southern Indian dish - often served as a hearty breakfast.

method.text: Place the lentils, sambhar powder, turmeric and water in a large, heavy pan. Bring to the boil. Lower the heat. Cover. Simmer for 20 min, until lentils are soft and mushy.

Mash the lentils with a potato masher. Add the okra, cauliflower, mooli or turnip, onion, sugar and salt to taste. Mix well, adding enough water to make the consistency of thick soup. Simmer for 10 min until vegetables are tender. Add the tomatoes and mix well.
In a separate frying pan, heat the oil. Fry the seasoning ingredients until the mustard seeds crackle.
Pour the spicy oil mixture over the vegetables. Cover the pan. Heat through and serve.

title: Sambhar lentil curry with vegetables
